about.name: Leah Weckworth
description: Leah has a B.S. in Environmental Science and Technology and has been a project manager with WestWater Engineering since 2008.

She has been responsible for environmental research, comprehensive noxious weed and vegetation management projects, documentation and regulatory permit guidance, reclamation planning and monitoring, and threatened and endangered species surveys.

She has been the project manager for several large linear pipeline projects from project permitting through reclamation monitoring and long-term vegetation management, as well as several oil and gas well pad developments and associated infrastructure.
Strengths include project management, client and regulatory agency coordination, reclamation and comprehensive vegetation management, and baseline environmental resource surveys.
